segments.text: I'm looking into a kitchen where a domestic drama is unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, two children are clearly up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is teetering on a wobbly two-step stool, reaching for a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His posture is precarious, and the stool looks like it could tip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the cookie jar and the other holding a plate, very clever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His accomplice, a little girl, is standing below him with an expectant look.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's reaching up, her palm open, clearly waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their secret mission, completely engrossed in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely unaware of their daring raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite amusing to see their coordinated effort to get those forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn't actually tip over with him on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're getting away with it, at least for now, right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mischievous pair they are, full of youthful energy.
segments.speaker: PAR
